contents.title: React 19 - 5 Features That Change Everything
contents.hook: React 19 removes 50% of boilerplate code. Here's how.
contents.notes: Covers: React Compiler, use() hook, Actions, Server Components, useOptimistic. Code comparisons for each.

bulletPoints: React Compiler - automatic memoization, no more useMemo/useCallback
use() hook - read promises anywhere, no useEffect for data
Actions - simplified form handling with useActionState
Server Components - zero JS sent to browser, direct DB access
useOptimistic - instant UI updates with auto-rollback

leads.name: 800 Tailor

leads.name: SM Automatic Laundry

leads.name: MM Laundry
leads.notes: Dry cleaning in Dubai and Sharjah. Business Bay, Marina, DIFC, Muwaileh.

leads.name: Kamie Photography Studio
leads.notes: Commercial photographer in Al Warsan, Dubai. Website could use booking system.

leads.name: Uthman Studio
leads.notes: Photography studio in Dubai. Wedding, family, corporate photography.

leads.name: 4Dimensions Studio
leads.notes: Photography studio in JLT, Dubai. Family photography specialist. 10+ years.

leads.name: Tutoring Club Dubai
leads.notes: Tutoring center in Dubai since 2014. American, IB, UK curriculum support.

leads.name: GuruAtHome
leads.notes: Online Indian tutoring for UAE students. CBSE Science and Math. Starts 21.90 AED/hr.

leads.name: Little Wonders Nursery
leads.notes: Nursery/preschool in Sharjah. Joy of Learning Nursery branch.

leads.name: Bumble Bee Nursery
leads.notes: Preschool and daycare in Sharjah since 2008. EYFS curriculum.

leads.name: Fission Fusion Fitness
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Amir Siddiqui, 20+ years coaching, calls himself Dubais most expensive personal trainer. LOCATION: Suite 16, Building 5, Gold & Diamond Park, Sheikh Zayed Rd. TARGET: CEOs, C-suite execs, entrepreneurs, solo business operators - people with money but physique doesnt match status. SERVICES: 3 membership tiers (Apprentice, Senior, Master), personalized nutrition plans, monthly fitness assessments. METHOD: Proprietary Fission~Fusion system - intelligent effective strength training, not trendy classes. PHILOSOPHY: Work for it, train hard, results matter. MEDIA: Khaleej Times, Gulf News, TimeOut Dubai, GQ, Esquire, Arabian Business. UNIQUE ANGLE: Premium positioning = needs premium website. Targets wealthy clients = high budget for services. PAIN POINTS: Booking system, client portal, membership management, premium brand website. Source: https://fissionfusionfitness.com/

leads.name: Fortius Dubai
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Milos Tanasic, 15+ years fitness, BSc Sports Science, ex-pro footballer (Europe). LOCATION: 6 4th Street, Al Quoz Industrial Area 3, Dubai. HOURS: Mon-Fri 6AM-8PM, Sat-Sun 8AM-6PM. SERVICES: Personal training, online body transformation, nutrition coaching, yoga, martial arts, life coaching, free consultations. TARGET: Busy professionals, high performers, weight loss seekers. APPROACH: Science-backed, personalized programs, sustainable lifestyle changes. RESULTS: Multiple transformations documented - Joey (10wk muscle gain), Rusana (30kg loss/16mo), Ali (model physique 8wk). TEAM: All trainers have BSc Sports Science, walked the walk themselves. UNIQUE: Empathetic guidance from trainers who transformed themselves. PAIN POINTS: Website could showcase results better, needs booking system, client portal for tracking. Source: https://www.fortiusdubai.com/

leads.name: In Vogue Beauty Salon
leads.notes: Beauty salon in UAE. Owner Alia Al-Ali found on LinkedIn. No website - great opportunity!

leads.name: Al Kadi Beauty Salon & SPA
leads.notes: Beauty salon and spa in Sharjah. Founder Rukhsar Khan. No website - perfect client!

leads.name: Boho Salon Dubai
leads.notes: First sustainable hair salon in Middle East. Founder is business strategist. Dubai branch opened 2023.

leads.name: The Nest Salon
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Started hairstyling at 14 (part-time UK salon), full-time apprentice at 16. Worked luxury cruise ships, Ritz-Carlton Cayman Islands, Bermuda, New Zealand. In Dubai since 2009. CAREER: Styled celebrities and royalty, fashion shows, photo shoots, magazine features. Managed 2 high-end salons before own business. FOUNDED: 2022 with business partner Inger (met in Cayman Islands in 20s). Started with 3 chairs in cozy space. NAME STORY: Bird built nest on Inger balcony same evening they chose name - felt like sign. CHALLENGES: Transitioning from stylist to businesswoman - no training in finances, marketing, operations, leadership. PERSONAL: Early riser (5AM), has dog, loves cooking, describes self as girly girl. VALUES: Creativity, making people feel good. 2025 PLANS: Expansion, new opportunities. PAIN POINTS: Business operations, marketing, likely needs professional website with booking. Source: https://graziamagazine.com/me/articles/the-nest-beauty-salon-dubai/

leads.name: Tara Rose Salon
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: British expat, 14 years in UAE. Nearly decade as professional hairdresser before business. FOUNDED: 2015 in villa, Khalifa City A, Abu Dhabi. INVESTMENT: Started with 400K AED (personal loan + savings). Rent was 300K AED. GROWTH: Now 4 salons, 60+ employees. 5th location opening in Al Quoz Dubai. 3rd salon (Mamsha Al Saadiyat 2020) cost 1.7M AED. CHALLENGES: Lacked business management experience - had to hire specialists. STRATEGY: Reinvests profits, lives on 60% salary, diversified into husband car dealership and UK property. FAMILY: Married, husband involved in business decisions. PAIN POINTS: Multi-location management, staff scheduling, inventory across branches. Source: https://gulfnews.com/your-money/community-tips/british-hairdresser-turns-owner-of-4-salons-in-7-years-in-the-uae-heres-how-1.1680101471485

leads.name: DentalDate
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Dr. Liliia Zhernova - orthodontist-gnathologist and therapist. APPROACH: Developed proprietary treatment protocols based on Austrian-German school principles. PHILOSOPHY: Modern techniques + high quality standards = aesthetic and functional balance. SPECIALTIES: Orthodontics, gnathology (jaw disorders), therapy. UNIQUE: Proprietary protocols = innovative, likely values cutting-edge approach. Austrian-German school = precision, quality - European standards. PAIN POINTS: SEO improvement, patient portal for appointments, showcase treatment results. EMAIL ANGLE: Mention her unique protocols deserve better online visibility. Source: https://dentaldate.ae/

leads.name: German Dental Clinic
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Dr. Abdolreza Nassouti - Founder & Medical Director. INNOVATION: First to offer 3D dental technology in Dubai. LOCATION: JLT (Jumeirah Lake Towers). USP: German precision, 3D technology pioneer in Dubai market. UNIQUE ANGLE: Tech-forward = appreciates innovation, early adopter. German = quality, precision branding. JLT location = business hub, professional clientele. PAIN POINTS: Modernize design to match tech-forward image, patient booking system, showcase 3D technology capabilities. EMAIL ANGLE: Website should reflect being a technology pioneer. Source: https://germandent.com/

leads.name: AbhiFit Lifestyle Coaching
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Abhinav Malhotra. AWARDS: Top Personal Trainer UAE - FIT AWARDS 2019. Personalized Fitness Innovation Award 2024 by Skillopaedia. EXPERIENCE: Ex-Elite Master Personal Trainer at Fitness First Middle East Dubai. RECOGNITION: Industry recognition for innovative approach. SERVICES: Body transformation, personalized fitness coaching. UNIQUE ANGLE: Award-winning = proven credibility, good for case studies. Multiple industry recognitions = likely values professional image. PAIN POINTS: Booking system, client portal, showcase awards/results on website. Source: https://abhifit.com/ + FIT Awards + Skillopaedia recognition

leads.name: 4Dimensions Photo Studio
leads.notes: Founder with Fine Art Degree. Experience in Graphic Design. Professional family and corporate photography.

leads.name: Christophe Viseux Photography
leads.notes: Dubai Wedding Photographer. Photojournalism background. Former Art Director in New York and Paris. Candid heartfelt moments specialist.

leads.name: Nel Ruelo Photography
leads.notes: Portrait and wedding photographer based in Dubai. Specializes in timeless elegance and unforgettable moments.

leads.name: Power Tutoring
leads.notes: British founder. Started 2006, Knowledge Village location for 7+ years. Specializes in UK curriculum English and maths tuition. Featured in The National.

leads.name: Pet Corner UAE
leads.notes: ROLE: Chief Pet Officer (unique title - conversation starter). GROWTH: Business doubled during pandemic. EXPANSION: 7→10 stores since 2021, tripled mobile grooming vans, 120 employees (doubled). SERVICES: Pet supplies, grooming, mobile grooming vans. PREMIUM LINE: The Pet Corner Elite Club (launched 2022) - diamond/gemstone collars starting AED37,000. MARKET INSIGHT: Couples choosing pets over children during pandemic drove demand. Strong luxury segment in UAE. TARGET: Affluent clientele seeking high-end pet products. PAIN POINTS: Multi-location management, e-commerce for premium products, mobile van scheduling/booking. Source: https://www.agbi.com/articles/from-chauf-fur-to-diamond-dog-collars-uae-pet-sector-booms/

leads.name: My Second Home Pet Resort
leads.notes: Co-founder. $2.7M investment. 5,800 sqm pet resort at Dubai Investment Park. High-end boarding facility opened 2015.

leads.name: Dubai Love Story Photography
leads.notes: Full-time lifestyle and intimate wedding photographer. Editorial style inspired by film and nature. Based in Dubai.

leads.name: BMA Studio
leads.notes: Founder & Director. Speaker at Design Perspective Dubai Edition 2025. Luxury Architecture & Interior Design.

leads.name: VS Design Studio
leads.notes: Founder & Design Director. Highly Commended Interior Designer of the Year - Design Middle East KSA Awards 2025.

leads.name: Roar Design Studio
leads.notes: Founder and Creative Director. High-profile commercial and hospitality projects across MENA region. One of UAE most promising designers.

leads.name: Balans Studio
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Ex-Emirates Airlines cabin crew (6+ years). Started as sales assistant at Warsaw Airport Duty Free. Polish origin. STORY: Noticed women felt intimidated in traditional gyms, created safe space for women. LOCATION: Dubai Marina. SERVICES: Pilates (mat+reformer), TRX, aerial, cold plunges, sauna, muscle treatments, organic matcha. PHILOSOPHY: Build community not just business. CHALLENGES: Standing out in competitive Dubai fitness market. PERSONAL: Mother, balances family with business. VALUES: Quality over quantity, functional luxury. EXPANSION PLANS: Events, training programs, additional locations. PAIN POINTS: Likely needs booking system, class scheduling, membership management. Source: https://emirateswoman.com/how-i-got-my-job-as-the-founder-of-dubais-most-aesthetic-pilates-studio/

leads.name: Dhyana Dubai
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Started career at Taj Hotels Group India as fitness instructor. 10+ years yoga practice. FOUNDED: November 2015. LOCATION: 5-star hotel in Business Bay with Burj Khalifa views. SERVICES: Hatha yoga, Kundalini, Vinyasa, Ashtanga, Pilates Reformer, Meditation - group and private. USP: Multilingual staff (8+ languages: Hindi, English, Russian, Arabic, French, Spanish, Punjabi, Romanian). PHILOSOPHY: Empower clients to discover inner strength. WHY BUSINESS BAY: Convenient for office workers, pedestrian accessible, prestigious. VIBE: Clean, welcoming - clients call it second home. PAIN POINTS: Premium location = needs premium website, online booking for busy professionals. Source: https://focus.hidubai.com/interview-with-regina-mazhar-studio-owner-at-dhyana-yoga-and-pilates-studio/

leads.name: Pilates Academy Dubai
leads.notes: Owner and Founder since 2014. P.A.I. and Balanced Body Master Trainer. Teaches across Middle East. Partnered with Anjali (Light Commune) EO member.

leads.name: HWH Studio
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Ex-Wall Street Equity Derivatives Sales Trader. Transitioned from finance to wellness. Favorite subject: English (loves stories and creativity). WHY DUBAI: Saw it as hub of innovation for wellness industry. FOUNDED: HWH Studio in Delano Dubai hotel. CONCEPT: More than a space - connection, community, sanctuary. Clients come as they are, feel seen, leave feeling more like themselves. SERVICES: Yoga, Pilates, holistic wellness treatments, mind-body-soul alignment. PHILOSOPHY: The mat is my anchor. Have clear vision and flow into it. CHALLENGE: Learning to delegate - cant do everything, leaning on team was growth point. VISION: Expand globally, create worldwide ripple effect of wellness. UNIQUE ANGLE: Finance background = understands business metrics, ROI - speak her language. PAIN POINTS: Booking system, membership portal, global expansion website. Source: https://emirateswoman.com/how-i-got-my-job-as-founder-of-this-uae-based-wellness-studio/

leads.name: The PAD
leads.notes: Managing Director. Co-founded with husband Abbas. Unique classes: Bhangralates and Bollywood Cardiolates. Reformer Pilates specialist.

leads.name: Mane Salon Dubai
leads.notes: FOUNDER: Anthony Walsh - award-winning salon owner. PHILOSOPHY: Passionate about blended effortless looks + amazing guest experience. DUAL ROLE: Hairstylist AND Educator - teaches other stylists and salon owners. UNIQUE: Education focus = values knowledge, professional development. Award-winning = quality-focused, cares about reputation. TARGET: Other hairstylists and salon owners as students. PAIN POINTS: Booking system, online portfolio showcasing work, possibly course booking for education business. EMAIL ANGLE: Education side needs professional platform to sell courses. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/anthony-walsh-0b5a6292/

leads.name: The Salon Dubai
leads.notes: Owner. American University Dubai educated. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/lily-raffan-b79b9093/

leads.name: Havie & Moon
leads.notes: CEO & Founder. Lifestyle brand and concept salon. Luxury organic sanctuary for women. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/christie-hunter-662418252/

leads.name: Gorgeous Flower Co.
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Studied Arabic at Durham University. First in Dubai 1984 with parents, returned 2009. Ex-account executive at marketing agency. FOUNDED: 2014 at age 40. HUSBAND: Co-founder, had flower business in UK - brings industry experience. WHY STARTED: Struggled to find quality flowers with good vase life in Dubai. Wanted to follow passion. LOCATION: Main shop and distribution center in Studio City. Online ordering available. PHILOSOPHY: Know your customers and market well. Build reputation for quality and service. Best advice: Always hire best people you can. CHALLENGES: Pandemic - maintaining team morale during uncertainty. TEAM FOCUS: Operations, product quality, packaging, employee motivation. GOALS: Continue excellent products and service for growth. PAIN POINTS: E-commerce optimization, delivery tracking, inventory management. Source: https://emirateswoman.com/got-job-founder-top-dubai-based-florist/

leads.name: Home Bakery
leads.notes: BACKGROUND: Abdullah studied law, sister Hind studied graphic design. Family of 4 siblings (2 active, 2 silent partners). ORIGIN: Hind started baking mini chewy melt cookies as hobby from home. Started with Twitter account for orders. GROWTH: Home kitchen → rented villa kitchen in Jumeirah → full café. Expanded from desserts to breakfast menu. ROLES: Hind = creative/kitchen/menu, Abdullah = operations/management. PHILOSOPHY: Passion over profit, never compromise quality. Abdullah worked as waiter for 2 months to learn every role. CHALLENGES: No F&B experience, learned from friends with franchise chains. Goal: every customer leaves satisfied. MENU STRATEGY: Intentionally small menu with frequent changes to encourage repeat visits. EXPANSION: Dubai and Abu Dhabi locations planned. REVENUE: $15.8M annually. EMIRATI-OWNED: Local family business - good angle for pitching. PAIN POINTS: Multi-location management, online ordering, delivery integration. Source: https://sailemagazine.com/2017/01/interview-with-abdullah-al-mulla-co-owner-of-home_bakery/

leads.name: The Fitness Potion
leads.notes: Founder. 15 years fitness industry. REPs UAE Level 3, EREPS Level 4. Ex Fitness First Dubai. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sandeepbhivania/

leads.name: Elite Fitness FZE
leads.notes: CEO. 8 years Dubai. 15+ years fitness industry. 6000+ clients. Multiple brands: fitnesstrainers.ae, LeanBody 90days. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vojislav-budrovac-316a1398/

leads.name: Rye Cafe and Juice Bar
leads.notes: Small Business Owner. 28 years culinary experience. Family-run business. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chefrobertstokes/

leads.name: Limelight Restaurant & Lounge
leads.notes: Founder & Owner. 20+ years catering, hotel, restaurant operations. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hicham-alami-7a0bb410/

leads.name: Sushi Buzz Restaurant
leads.notes: Entrepreneur, CEO & Founder. Growing restaurant market in Dubai. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohamed-khalil-57981444/

leads.name: Arabian Tea House
leads.notes: Founder. Since 1997. 5 branches in UAE (Sharjah, Mercato Mall Jumeirah, others). Source: https://www.linkedin.com/company/arabian-tea-house-restaurant-cafe

leads.name: Menza Café
leads.notes: Owner. Dubai based. Source: https://www.linkedin.com/in/anwar-bouzaher-970721257/

messages.subject: Quick question about Glamour Beauty's website
messages.body:
Hi Fatima,

I noticed your salon website could benefit from an online booking system...

emailTemplates.name: Free Website Audit Offer
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, quick question about {{company}}'s website
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I was looking at {{industry}} businesses in the UAE and came across {{company}}.

I noticed a few things on your website that might be affecting your bookings:

• Mobile experience could be smoother
• Booking/contact process has some friction
• Loading speed could be improved

I help {{industry}} business owners like yourself get more customers through better websites.

Would a free 5-minute video showing exactly what I found be helpful? No strings attached.

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Value First - Quick Wins
emailTemplates.subject: 3 things {{company}} could fix today
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I specialize in helping {{industry}} businesses in Dubai get more customers online.

I checked out {{company}}'s website and found 3 quick wins you could implement today:

1. Add a clear "Book Now" button above the fold
2. Include customer reviews on the homepage
3. Optimize images for faster loading

These take about 10 minutes each and can make a real difference.

Interested in hearing about some bigger improvements that could really move the needle?

Just reply "yes" and I'll share more.

Cheers,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Case Study Approach
emailTemplates.subject: How a {{industry}} business got 40% more customers
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I recently helped a {{industry}} business similar to {{company}} increase their online bookings by 40% in just 2 months.

Here's what we did:
- Added online booking (customers book 24/7)
- Made the site mobile-friendly (70% of visitors are on phones)
- Improved Google ranking (now on page 1)

I'd love to do the same for {{company}}.

Would you be open to a quick 10-minute call to see if this could work for you?

Best,
Hanzla
Web Developer | Dubai

emailTemplates.name: Premium Fitness - CEO Clients
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, your clients expect premium - does your website deliver?
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I came across {{company}} and noticed you work with CEOs and high-performers who demand excellence.

Your training methodology is clearly premium - but I noticed your website might not be reflecting that same level.

For clients paying top-tier rates, every touchpoint matters:
• Seamless online booking (24/7 for busy executives)

I help premium fitness businesses like yours build digital experiences that match their service quality.

Worth a quick chat to see if I can help?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Transformation Results Showcase
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, your client transformations deserve better visibility
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I saw the incredible transformation results from {{company}} - Joey's 10-week journey, Rusana's 30kg loss... those results speak for themselves.

But here's the thing - potential clients are searching for proof before they commit. A website that showcases these transformations properly can be your best salesperson.

I help fitness professionals turn their client success stories into conversion machines:

Your results are already doing the hard work - let's make sure the world sees them.

Interested in a quick chat?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Ex-Corporate Professional
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, fellow career-changer here
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I read about your journey from corporate to wellness entrepreneurship - that takes real courage.

As someone who also transitioned into running my own business, I know how different the challenges are. You understand ROI, metrics, and what it takes to scale.

But building a digital presence that matches your vision? That's a different skillset.

I help business owners like you build websites that:
• Convert visitors into paying clients
• Automate bookings so you can focus on what you do best
• Scale with you as you expand globally

Your business acumen got you here - let me help with the tech side.

Worth 15 minutes to explore?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Ex-Airline Professional
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, from Emirates to entrepreneur
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I loved reading about your journey from Emirates cabin crew to building {{company}}.

You saw a gap in the market - women feeling intimidated in gyms - and created something special. That's exactly the kind of purpose-driven business I love working with.

Now that you're expanding with events and new locations, your digital presence needs to keep up:
• Online booking that fills your classes
• Membership management without the spreadsheets
• A website that captures your community vibe

I help wellness founders like you build tech that supports growth without losing that personal touch.

Want to chat about how I can help?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Multilingual Business
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, reaching clients in 8 languages
emailTemplates.body:

I came across {{company}} and was impressed - a team that teaches in 8 languages serving Business Bay's diverse professionals.

With your 5-star hotel location and Burj Khalifa views, you're clearly positioned for premium clients. But is your website doing that positioning justice?

For busy professionals in Business Bay, convenience is everything:

I help premium wellness businesses convert their location advantage into more bookings.

Worth a quick call to discuss?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Multi-Location Salon Growth
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, managing 4 salons is hard - your website should help
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I read about your incredible growth - from a villa in Khalifa City to 4 salons with 60+ employees. And now a 5th location in Al Quoz!

You mentioned the challenge of going from hairdresser to businesswoman. I help salon owners like you solve one piece of that puzzle:

A website that works across all locations:

With your expansion rate, you need systems that scale with you.

Want to chat about making your digital presence as impressive as your growth story?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Celebrity Stylist Background
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, from Ritz-Carlton to The Nest
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

Your journey is incredible - from styling at the Ritz-Carlton to celebrities and royalty, and now building The Nest with Inger.

You mentioned the biggest challenge was transitioning from stylist to businesswoman - no training in finances, marketing, or operations.

I can't help with all of that, but I CAN take the website piece off your plate:
• A booking system so you're not managing appointments manually
• An online presence that reflects your celebrity-level work
• Marketing-ready pages that you can share with confidence

Let me handle the tech so you can focus on what you do best - creating beautiful hair.

15 minutes for a quick chat?

Best,
Hanzla

emailTemplates.name: Emirati Family Business
emailTemplates.subject: {{contactPerson}}, your family's story deserves a better website
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

"Chief Pet Officer" - love that title! I saw how {{company}} doubled during the pandemic and you're now at 10 stores with 120 employees.

emailTemplates.body:

Best,

emailTemplates.name: Gentle Follow-up (3 days)

emailTemplates.body:

emailTemplates.name: Value Follow-up (7 days)

emailTemplates.body:

1. Your Google Business listing could use some optimization

emailTemplates.name: Breakup Email (14 days)
emailTemplates.subject: Should I close your file, {{contactPerson}}?
emailTemplates.body:
Hi {{contactPerson}},

I've reached out a couple of times about helping {{company}} with your website, but I haven't heard back.

No worries at all - I know timing isn't always right.

I'm going to assume you're either:
• Happy with your current website
• Too busy right now
• Not interested

All totally fine! I'll close your file for now.

If things change down the road, feel free to reach out.

Wishing you continued success with {{company}}!

Best,
Hanzla
